description:
Blockpost is a 3D pixel sandbox game focused on building and adventure. To get gold coins in Blockpost, here are a few methods you can try:

1. Defeat monsters - By defeating monsters like skeletons and zombies, they will occasionally drop gold coins. The more difficult the monster, the more coins they may drop.

2. Find treasure chests - Hidden treasure chests may contain gold coins and other valuable loot. Look for chests hidden in caves, dungeons, ruined buildings, and other places.

3. Mine gold ore - Gold ore can be mined using a pickaxe and then smelted in a furnace to produce gold ingots that can be crafted into gold coins. Look for gold ore veins in caves and mining tunnels.

4. Complete quests - As you progress and complete quests given by NPCs in the game, they will often reward you with gold coins.

5. Trade with other players - You can trade valuable resources and items with other players in exchange for gold coins that they have obtained through the above methods.
name: how to get gold coins in blockpost
